name: Mistur Pie's Odyssey
description:
On the special occasion of Mistur Pie's birthday, Pie Fan Club's CEO - Monke is releasing this video game to honour him.

 Monke misses Pie everyday too-much-many-a-lot. 

Can Mistur Pie please wear his hero cape, escape the ticking time bombs that are ever-present between them, and reach Monke?
